file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-51-09-04 - OBSERVER HOT MIC PTT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL OBSERVER HOT MIC PTT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Hot Mic PTT switch. B. The Hot Mic PTT switch is installed on the observer audio panel. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY OBSERVER HOT MIC PTT SWITCH - RE- ALL 23-51-09-000-801-A MOVAL OBSERVER HOT MIC PTT SWITCH - IN- ALL 23-51-09-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-51-09 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-09-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. OBSERVER HOT MIC PTT SWITCH - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Hot Mic PTT switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-51-06-000-801-A/400 OBSERVER-AUDIO JACK PANEL - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 224 Cockpit - RH side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Soldering Iron To remove the solder and release the wires available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE In the cockpit, RH side, behind the copilot 1 Does the task seat I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the Observer Audio Jack Panel ( AMM TASK 23-51-06-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the four screws (1) and washers (2). (2) Remove the acrylic panel (3). (3) Unsolder the wires. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-09 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Remove the nut (4) and washer (5). (5) Remove the Hot Mic PTT switch (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-09 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

A DET. B B 1. SCREW (4) 2. WASHER (4) 3. ACRYLIC PANEL DET. C 4. NUT 5. WASHER 6. HOT MIC PTT 145AMM230460.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-09 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-09-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. OBSERVER HOT MIC PTT SWITCH - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Hot Mic PTT switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-51-00-700-802-A/500 AUDIO SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST AMM TASK 23-51-06-400-801-A/400 OBSERVER-AUDIO JACK PANEL - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 224 Cockpit - RH side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Soldering Iron To solder the wires available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE In the cockpit, RH side, behind the copilot 1 Does the task seat I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the Hot Mic PTT switch (6). (2) Install the washer (5) and nut (4). (3) Solder the wires. (4) Install the acrylic panel (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-09 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Install the four washers (2) and screws (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the Observer Audio Jack Panel ( AMM TASK 23-51-06-400-801-A/400). (2) Do the Audio System Operational Test ( AMM TASK 23-51-00-700-802-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-09 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
